data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=G_pFLQUJ3sMQ7kNvgE6yRyL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYCU7eQRDig_LXcG2uFoe3tfSsT52jlwMw8I9-NmEurqfw&oe=66F0001C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bd9sk88UR44Q7kNvgH-LyYj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYCIMlfAvpRDwia8lzTO799rgE5K3Kvke3R1jHiq6fJf-g&oe=66F009A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cznYKwVjD7MQ7kNvgFUzngA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYCVzV7hbCMbu0zTvzAJLMcDjAI1p9VylcPZ4aEhT_ynyA&oe=66EFF107)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Erxr58OHOXoQ7kNvgGnhkIw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYBqMC9zhuVOKsfB8HvXn8ObrH0sWQ_eROXTTTF_Q4RCmw&oe=66EFE3E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ANbqbsv6t24Q7kNvgEXkZ7S&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYCfpsuaNO-_6FUlKGx9CMbWpee2eEG4h2pKcHiS13C-zw&oe=66F01058)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1Ja3NkqYtfwQ7kNvgFEXdXZ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYBi_ZBOIxlB2et0dsE9YEs30CxV-5f2MLJZIQm_gvK-Zw&oe=66F00CD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=MsopJx0UdvsQ7kNvgEO03Mc&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYD4SWRHFN_l78lsFICbkVuDWjrDbyVDTS3fQ7OnGCm7HA&oe=66EFF2F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2kXfmfSaBYAQ7kNvgFmYZ_2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYDaMJg_aceUD-l7-0tdmrkqdrtQ5IyL07oryTzx8d853w&oe=66F015AA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nTZbk78cip4Q7kNvgFtlV7A&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYBCP-K8D4miuvW2y5zMdu59hRnkkOBvOIhqUixsx4nUdg&oe=66EFF117)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9b0nA4P83pMQ7kNvgEi5zVz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AcTeiKoEmPzqqXFHhx3y4xF&oh=00_AYDdt6L5P4vMkanpMMYYJ8SZs6JQAFvgLsIyMvqK3V6iFQ&oe=66F00C8C)
